channel.title: Sebastian Wozny's adventures with technology
channel.description: A story of failure and epic win.

item.title: Reclaimed the master branch
item.description:
Today I made the decision to regain control of my product. I fixed the problems with eestec.net master and reclaimed my project. I am not afraid of the software that I created. I will fix those bugs.

On a more serious note, I think the decision to rewrite everything in eestec.net was questionable. It told me a lot about AngularJS, django-rest-framework and client-server communication but it slowed down work significantly. Iâ€™m not dropping the version 3.0 release, but I will put more effort into maintaining the 2.0 version.

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description: Finally got the blog up. So apparently the cygwin version of ruby 2.4.8 will put the jekyll executable in $HOME/bin out of all places. Anyway, I hope this will be a successful blog.
